titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at Snarford in Lincolnshire at the funerals of Sir George Sanct-Paule, knight and baronet, December the 9. 1613 by Iohn Chadvvich ... ; together with a briefe and true relation of his vertuous life and holy death.
titleStmt.author: Chadwich, John.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by William Stansby for William Barret, and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls Church-yard at the signe of the Three Pigeons,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University. Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Pauls Church-yard at the signe of the Three Pigeons
